{"title": "Elemental Gimmick Gear", "title_search": "elemental gimmick gear", "title_keyword": "elemental gimmick gear", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/elemental-gimmick-gear/", "summary": "While dipping through the ancient ruins, archaeologists found a sleeping man inside an egg-shaped machine.
